lead_paragraph: The music at Greek-owned Astoria Seafood, a fish shop with tables and often long waits, is an invitation to cut the rug (on the white tiles).

headline.main: Dancing With the Fishes at a Restaurant in Queens

snippet: The music at Greek-owned Astoria Seafood, a fish shop with tables and often long waits, is an invitation to cut the rug (on the white tiles).
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Astoria Seafood, which has evolved from fish market to trendy restaurant in Astoria, Queens.
